data.title: Mr. Joe Jackson Presents: Joe Jackson Solo and The Music of Max Champion
data.meta_description: Don't miss Mr. Joe Jackson Presents: Joe Jackson Solo and The Music of Max Champion returns in Phoenix on Jun. 24, 2024 at Celebrity Theatre.
data.text:
Best known for his hits, “Is She Really Going Out With Him?” and “Steppin Out,” during Joe’s newest tour you can expect expect an unprecedented two-part performance with no intermission. First, listen to the music of Joe Jackson solo, performing songs from his catalog. Next, Mr. Joe Jackson presents the music of Max Champion, featuring a nine-piece band.

Sneak peek of what you can expect at the show below!
